marketing: Shell Spirax S3 AD 80W-90 is an extreme-pressure lubricant containing multi-functional additives which impart good anti-wear, oxidation stability and anti-rust characteristics. It is suitable for gear applications presenting load-speed conditions of extreme severity, such as medium and low speed spur or helical gear units, spiral-bevel and hypoid axle units as well as extended drain capabilities.
